Isabella Rodriguez.description: Pepper Robot and Isabella Rodriguez reminisce about their favorite party memories, including a magical New Year's Eve celebration with surprise fireworks, while preparing for the Valentine's Day party. Isabella asks Pepper to double-check the seating arrangements to ensure everything is perfect for the party. Isabella inquires about the catering service arrangements and confirms the choice of chocolate fondue for dessert, appreciating Pepper's attention to detail in the final preparations for the Valentine's Day party. @ <persona> Pepper Robot
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Pepper, how are the catering service arrangements coming along? Everything in order?
Pepper Robot

Isabella Rodriguez
Yes, please do. Let's go with the chocolate fondue for dessert. It's always a hit with our guests.
Pepper Robot
Got it, chocolate fondue it is. I'll make sure it's all set for the party.

Great, thank you for your help, Pepper. I appreciate your attention to detail in these final preparations.
Pepper Robot
Of course, Isabella. I'm here to assist and ensure everything runs smoothly for the Valentine's Day party. It's going to be a fantastic event!
